To get original data_x use: (data - min)/scale and do it feature wise
scale: [1.87865913e-05 4.70049876e-05 9.93208545e-05 1.30578934e-01
 3.75993929e+00 1.11547237e-04 3.07508023e+00 1.00000000e+00
 1.00000000e+00 1.00000000e+00 1.00000000e+00 1.00000000e+00
 1.00000000e+00 1.00000000e+00 1.00000000e+00]
min:[-2.02799374e-05  0.00000000e+00 -2.11052843e-05  0.00000000e+00
 -9.02099573e-01 -4.24914931e-04 -6.80883511e-04  0.00000000e+00
  0.00000000e+00  0.00000000e+00  0.00000000e+00  0.00000000e+00
  0.00000000e+00  0.00000000e+00  0.00000000e+00]
